features: Ultra Power Plus Laundry Detergent Packs feature 20% more cleaning power to tackle your toughest stains
0% synthetic fragrances, dyes or artificial brightener in this washing detergent
EPA Safer Choice Certified Product; clothes detergent designed with safety in mind
Fast-dissolving laundry detergent powder packs work in high-efficiency (HE) and standard machines
High efficient laundry detergent that is a USDA Certified Biobased Product, 94% made with plant-based ingredients
body.description: Sometimes you've got to pull out the big guns. Seventh Generation Ultra Power Plus Laundry Detergent Packs feature an advanced stain fighting formula with 20% more cleaning power. Fight your toughest stains like coffee, tomato sauce, grass, and ice cream - all without the use of synthetic fragrances, dyes, or artificial brighteners. This laundry soap uses plant-derived enzyme stain removers like Pro tease and Amylase to tackle the mess, while whitening and anti-graying enzymes help brighten. We like to keep it real when it comes to scents, too. Our Fresh Citrus Laundry Detergent is scented with 100% essential oils and botanical ingredients like orange peel, grapefruit peel, and lavender. Our new tub packaging is fully recyclable and designed with storage and freshness in mind - the shape fits neatly in tight spaces, and the flip top closure keeps packs fresh and unreachable from your little ones. These easy-to-use laundry packs are wrapped in a dissolvable PVA film - just toss one into your high-efficiency (HE) or standard washing machine and let our plant-based ingredients work their wonder. For more than 25 years, Seventh Generation has been thoughtfully formulating safe and effective plant-based products that work. Really well. As a leading green washing detergent manufacturer, we are proud to offer the first powdered laundry packs that are EPA Safer Choice Certified. You may also notice a cute Leaping Bunny seal on our products. That means we never test our products on animals and our products do not contain animal-based ingredients. We design our products to be safe for people, their homes, and the environment. Based in Vermont, Seventh Generation is proud to be a Certified B Corporation. By choosing Seventh Generation products, you're joining us in nurturing the health of the next seven generations. Compared to the amount of cleaning enzymes in our laundry detergent packs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have to put more pods than recommended to get truly clean, but it gets things clean and there is a tinge of fresh smell to it. A little pricey but worth it since its non-toxic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, we're impressed!
reviews.reviewText: We have used Norwex for a few years, however we love Seventh Generation Stain Remover-it's the best. Since we loved the stain remover so much, we thought we'd try the detergent. It is awesome! Our clothes have come out very clean and super soft. The dryer sheets and scent boosters are great too. The scent is soft and smells amazing. We're going to try the whole line of Seventh Generation products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice subtle scent, great for bath towels and rags!
reviews.reviewText: I am super scent sensitive so I cannot use liquid laundry detergents with fragrance because the smell lingers in the dispenser and I get a headache. These are great because the scent is very mild, I ziploc the bag very tightly so as it does not make the hallway smell like citrus. It sits right around the corner from the bedroom so any smells literally keep me up at night. I noticed in the reviews many people felt it did not get clothes clean or the smell was too faint. I had a very smelly laundry basket of bath towels and wet rags etc that sit in the great summer heat and begin to reek. Put 2 pods in the washer with a large load today and added some baking soda for softening and wow. They came out of the washer smelling clean with a hint of citrus which was great. I am excited to see how they smell etc tonight when I take out of the dryer to fold and put away. So far so good this will remain on my list for washing bath towels. May even let my man use a single pod for his clothes since he likes fragrances. lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, but I have hard water
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product, my son has sensitive skin and this product works well for him. I have hard water and it takes 3 pods for me to get large loads clean. I also noticed if I use cold water the pods don’t completely dissolve (I’m sure it’s because of the water I have). My machine does have 5 water temp options so usually choose 1 above cold and That does the trick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love this laundry detergent!
reviews.reviewText: This is the 3-4 th time we’ve ordered this. We live on a farm the produces heavy dirt! This delivers clean clothes, no stain and they smell fresh. Prrfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Husband does laundry
reviews.reviewText: My husband does the laundry. Before you praise him he only does it because he wears a uniform for work and he refuses to buy more pants ,socks, underwear etc. Therefore he has to wash clothes more often. Plus our home is off grid and we use grey water for the animals this product works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything seems clean.
reviews.reviewText: I guess it works. Thinks smell nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the ECO minded individual
reviews.reviewText: The perfect solution to gid rid of plastic detergent containers! I am also quite impressed with the ability of the product to clean clothes, much better than detergent sheets
Love this product. Stained shirts always came out clean and bright.
